name: TheLaborsofHercules
0:
”Alexa, open the labors of hercules”
”Alexa, start the labors of hercules”
”Alexa, launch the labors of hercules”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the labors of hercules
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Most of us have read a book or seen a movie that references the famous deeds of the Greek Hero Hercules. These stories have influenced art, literature, and theater for over 2,000 years. Now you can listen and enjoy these stories at your own pace. You will learn about the exotic locations, perilous quests, magical weapons, and fearsome beasts that populate the fantastical world of Hercules.

The Labors of Hercules Skill is divided into 12 chapters. Each chapter describes one of the labors of Hercules using voice and visual content. All 12 chapters can be accessed by voice from the Main Menu. Once you have listened to a chapter, you have the option to replay, move to the next chapter or return to the main menu. This Skill offers a voice-first experience and can be used on all Amazon Echo devices.

The Labors of Hercules Skill uses Amazon's new Alexa programming language called APL or Alexa Presentation Language. APL provides Alexa Skill Developers with the ability to create better and more engaging content by incorporating visual content.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
